column4: If i'm having trouble getting WoW to work under wine on ubuntu wheres the best place to ask?
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WorldofWarcraft has some troubleshooting stuff, see if your problem is on there (also, make sure you've followed those instructions)
Yeah i was following the guide there to begin with. I'm having an issue with the installer that wasnt addressed (as far as i can tell)
Ah, your best bet is #winehq then, they should be able to help.
